attributes.action: Lodge a formal complaint to the Administration of the US to complain about the setting up of a designated airline for pets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The setting up of an airline designated to the transportation of pets in the US is a disgrace given that the people rest of the world are doing all in their power to reduce pollution and are facing spiralling energy costs to achieve these ends - this is just making a mockery of our efforts and the British government should let our feelings be known to the authorities in the USA.
